p: Various routes of infection have been used to establish HSV encephalitis in mice, including intranasal, 9 intracerebral and IP, 10, 11 and intracutaneous. 12 We used primarily ocular infection (see below) for comparison of drug–drug combination efficacy. Mean days of death after infection (MDD) in untreated animals were usually 9–10 with HSV-1 and 11–12 with HSV-2 infections. For comparison, in one experiment we used intranasal infection in which the MDDs for HSV-1 and HSV-2 were 9.1 and 9.9 days, respectively.
